instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-4925 ORANGE LIGHT NO POWER
threads.message: I HAVE I HAVE PPBUS_G3H AND PP5V_S5 AND PP3V3_S5 BUT NO PP5V_S4 OR S3 DOES U8060 GIVE PP5V_S4 I NEED HELP

threads.title: 820-4925 ORANGE LIGHT NO POWER
threads.message:
Please do NOT use capital letters, apart of signal/voltage names.
An entire row with same letters height is not easy to read as normal small letters...

Post PM_BATLOW_L; be sure to use original 60/85W Magsafe 2 charger.
Also post PM_DSW_PWRGD, PCH_DSWVRMEN, PM_RSMRST_L and PM_PWRBTN_L.
Trigger SMC_ONOFF_L and check for drop pulse at PM_PWRBTN_L at same time.

threads.title: 820-4925 ORANGE LIGHT NO POWER
threads.message:
"Trigger SMC_ONOFF_L and check for drop pulse at PM_PWRBTN_L at same time"
